childMarkdownRemark.html: The open source hardware community is global, we have certifications from all over the world with incredible projects from microcontrollers, to e-textiles, and even planting benches. We welcome a vast definition of hardware and recognize anything made of atoms rather than bits which has led to a vast community of creators. OSHWA works to engage open source creators from around the world with programs, events and the Open Hardware Summit.
